fork_status_and_schedule.highlight: Sepolia BPO2 and Hoodie Fusaka completed successfully with minor operator issues and Reth block building bug (already patched)
Mainnet dates confirmed: releases November 3rd, fork December 3rd, BPO1 December 9th, BPO2 January 7th
Prysm has peering bug causing non-Prysm peers to be kicked after hours - release delayed but mainnet dates proceed

glamsterdam_scoping.highlight: Client teams to submit written scoping proposals by November 13th for CL-side EIPs
EIP-8045 excludes slashed validators from proposer shuffling (simple one-line change)
EIP-8061 increases churn limits 4x, reducing weak subjectivity from ~15 days to ~6 days
Concern raised that EIP-8061 enables rapid issuance changes - 80M ETH could deposit in one year
EIP-8062 adds 0.25% fee to sweep withdrawals; EIP-8068 balances yield between skimming and compounding validators
Consolidation-as-withdrawal fix addresses queue exploitation but is UX improvement, not security critical

peerdas_and_scaling.highlight: Cell-level deltas eliminates redundant column transmission, enabling scaling from 21 to 72 max blobs
Prysm prototype ready, Lighthouse implementing; early results show 10x reduction in column traffic
Timeline: finalized spec by November, production implementations by December, BPO3 launch ~February 26th

focil_discussion.highlight: FOCIL has 2 EL + 4 CL client interop, estimated ~2 month Glamsterdam delay
Trade-off presented: shipping cadence vs. risk that political/regulatory environment makes future inclusion harder

organizational.highlight: CFI/SFI lockstep process: only SFI'd EIPs go on DevNets, others stay CFI'd until ready

action_items.action: Release mainnet-ready Prysm version as soon as peering bug is fixed
Get point person per team for incident response and update Fusaka process doc
Submit written proposals for Glamsterdam CL scoping by November 13th
Rehash and merge GetBlobsv3 Engine API PRs by November; CL teams review PeerDAS specs and begin implementation by December

decisions.decision: Fusaka mainnet confirmed: releases Nov 3rd, fork Dec 3rd, BPO1 Dec 9th, BPO2 Jan 7th 2026
Glamsterdam CL scoping decisions to be made at next ACDC (Nov 13th) after written proposals submitted
Use CFI/SFI lockstep process for Glamsterdam - EIPs move to SFI only when ready for DevNets

targets.target: Fusaka: releases Nov 3rd, fork Dec 3rd, BPO1 Dec 9th, BPO2 Jan 7th 2026
Glamsterdam scoping proposals due November 13th (next ACDC)
PeerDAS: finalized spec Nov 2025, production implementations Dec 2025, BPO3 ~Feb 26th 2026
